item.title: Swift Data中withUnsafeBytes进行gzip压缩的陷阱
Swift预编译宏添加
item.description:
1.swift预编译宏添加

在Xcode中，项目的build Settings，搜索 Swift Compiler，选择Other Swift Flags，添加环境变量。注意添加 -D参数.

item.title: iOS视频播放-AVPlayer和AVPlayerLayer

item.title: swift泛型
item.description: /// 交换两个对象的值 /// /// - Parameters: /// - aValue: 对象a /// - bValue: 对象b func swapValues<T>(_ aValue: inout T, _ bValue: inout T) { let temp = aValue aValue = bValue bValue = temp } /// 栈模板 struct QStack<T> { var items = [T]() mutating func push(_ item: T) { items.append(item) } mutating func pop() -> T

item.title: swift中pthread_t之mutex
item.description: mutex类型有四种 PTHREAD_MUTEX_NORMAL PTHREAD_MUTEX_ERRORCHECK PTHREAD_MUTEX_RECURSIVE PTHREAD_MUTEX_DEFAULT 1.mutex初始化 var mutex = pthread_mutex_t() var attr: pthread_mutexattr_t = pthread_mutexattr_t() pthread_mutexattr_init(&attr) pthread_mutexattr_settype(&attr, PTHREAD_MUTEX_RECURSIVE) pthread_mutex_init(&mutex, &attr) 2.mutex使用 pthread_mutex_trylock(&mutex) //执行代码块 pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex) 3.mutex释放 pthread_mutex_destroy(&mutex)

item.description: synchronized->objc_sync_enter/objc_sync_exit objc_sync_enter： 递归锁，与objc_sync_exit配合使用，注意死锁 Begin synchronizing on ‘obj’. Allocates recursive pthread_mutex associated with ‘obj’ if needed. Parameters obj The object to begin synchronizing on. Returns OBJC_SYNC_SUCCESS once lock is

item.title: swift-ecdh
item.description: swift 在iOS10之后，支持ecdh加解密。 1.生成公钥和私钥 func generateKey() { let attributes: [String: Any] = [kSecAttrKeySizeInBits as String: 256, kSecAttrKeyType as String: kSecAttrKeyTypeEC, kSecPrivateKeyAttrs as String: [kSecAttrIsPermanent as String: false]] var error: Unmanaged<CFError>? self.privateKey = SecKeyCreateRandomKey(attributes as CFDictionary, &error) if self.privateKey != nil { self.publicKey = SecKeyCopyPublicKey(self.privateKey!) }

item.description: swift进行RSA加解密时，如果使用 OAEP时，有什么区别？ 1.RSA加密 @objc public func encrypt(source: String, padding: SecPadding = SecPadding.PKCS1) -> String { guard source.count > 0 && self.publicSecKey != nil else { return "" } let data: NSData = (source.data(using: String.Encoding.utf8)! as

item.title: swift-RSA(五)-签名/验签
item.description: RSA支持加解密，也支持签名/验签。 使用rsa如何签名/验签呢？ 1.rsa 签名 @objc public func sign(source: Data, padding: SecPadding = SecPadding.PKCS1SHA1) -> Data? { guard source.count > 0 && self.privateSecKey != nil else { return nil } let hashData: NSData? switch padding { case SecPadding.PKCS1SHA1: hashData =
